title: What is the lyrically best rap song ever? - Quora

response.answer_text:
This is an interesting question. I can't nominate a song that is "lyrically" the best because I think there is no standardized way of judging what makes one song "lyrically better" than another, but I do have a nomination for two incredibly deep and lyrical rap songs (which I will mention later). There are many variables (family lives, experiences growing up, influences from other peers in their lives both from the rap game and their personal lives, their tastes in other music, etc.) that go into the content that rappers put out, so it's very hard to find a commonality among all the rap songs we hear and make a singular and "end-all" decision on the best rap song of all time (lyrically). However, I do have TWO nominations for songs that came out quite recently.
